A great slidedeck describing just in the right detail for those who’s interested in applying machine learning and computational disciplines to the field of biology, medicine, and genomics. It talks about the current problems in these fields.

Slides

Speaker

Gary Bader is a computational biology faculty member at the University of Toronto since 2006. He is in the Department of Molecular Genetics in the Faculty of Medicine and also the Department of Computer Science. He is also the Principal Investigator of the Bader Lab.
